item.description:
We'll show the movie adaptation of the book we're discussing: John Irving's "The Cider House Rules".

As a special treat, on Friday, July 13, we will screen the 1999 film adaptation starring Tobey Maguire and Michael Caine. John Irving and Michael Caine both won Academy Awards for the film, which was also nominated for Best Picture.

We’ll start with a potluck supper starting at 6:30 p.m. with the film to follow. Please bring a dish.
item.name: Movie - The Cider House Rules
